tool_description: An API showing all the latest Stock Market News
name: Live Stock Market News
title: Live Stock Market News

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get News about Stock Market from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-stock-market-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/economic_times"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-stock-market-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-stock-market-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-stock-market-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Stock Market News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news of stock market.
